Cixi county level city in Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1], Zhejiang

sentences.english: Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 壽被賦予慈溪太后她皇后繡掛毯，八老慶祝生日。

sentences.english: But the ideals were stifled by Cixi and Guangxu was jailed in his own palace.
sentences.chinese: 但是，理想扼殺慈溪和光緒被關押在自己的宮殿。

sentences.english: Cixi peasant paintings have a striking cultural feature of east Zhejiang area.
sentences.chinese: 慈溪農民畫具有濃郁的浙東文化特徵。

sentences.english: Kong Xiaoyu, tribal name, the British constitution, with words, origin Cixi.
sentences.chinese: 孔小瑜，族名憲英，以字行，出身慈溪。

sentences.english: The Cixi city fire prevention channel plan is proposed simultaneous with the urban road construction.
sentences.chinese: 然後結合城市道路建設，提出了慈溪市消防通道規劃。

sentences.english: Cixi concentrated on centralizing her own power base.
sentences.chinese: 慈溪市集中集中自己的權力基礎。

sentences.english: I have lived in Cixi since I graduated from ECNU.
sentences.chinese: 自從華師大畢業後，我一直住在慈溪。
